description_text:
Hello, but I didn't receive any information about my order. Has it been
shipped or what happened?  Order number #SSN2807

conversations.body_text:
Why you don’t answer?!

في أربعاء، 8 أكتوبر، 2025 في 1:13 م، كتب support@simsonn.com <
support@simsonn.com>:

> Hi Thuq 23
>
> We would like to acknowledge that we have received your request and a
> ticket has been created.
> A support representative will be reviewing your request and will send you
> a personal response.(usually within 24 hours).
>
> To view the status of the ticket or add comments, please visit
> https://simsonn.freshdesk.com/helpdesk/tickets/4584?follow=email
>
> Thank you for your patience.
> View ticket
> <https://simsonn.freshdesk.com/helpdesk/tickets/4584?follow=email>
> *If the button doesn't work, copy-paste this URL in your browser's address
> bar: *https://simsonn.freshdesk.com/helpdesk/tickets/4584?follow=email
>
> Regards,
> simsonn Support Team
>
> 4584:4206036
>

Hi Thuq 23,    We sincerely apologize for the delayed response. We have just concluded our 8-day holiday. We will arrange for your shipment as soon as possible. Thank you for your understanding. Our deepest apologies!
